say_hello_EDA[source]

say_hello_EDA(to)

this method will say hello to the person named 'to'

params:

to: str, name of the person to which greetings is made return: 1 on success

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
say_hello_EDA('ashish')

'hello there ashish - EDA'
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
assert say_hello_EDA("Ashish")=='hello there Ashish - EDA'
{% endraw %}
